StringTable.String: %s - Remote Desktop
WalTscClient
Fatal Error (Error Code: %d)
The session will be disconnected. Your computer may be low on memory.\nAfter closing some applications, try to reconnect the session.
Disconnect Windows Session
This will disconnect your Windows session. Your programs will \ncontinue to run while you are disconnected. You can \nreconnect to this session later by logging on again.

Remote Desktop Connection

MotoTSCClient [/Session=Session] [/Shutdown] | /Session -- specifies the Session to which you want to connect.
/Shutdown -- Terminates Program.
An error occurred when the client attempted to connect to the remote computer. \nCheck your system memory and then try the connection again.
Connecting - v%d.%d.%02d
Retry #%d
Waiting for Valid IP Address
Waiting %d Sec.
Low or No Signal. Wait to Connect.
No Signal
Please return to Radio Coverage or press Close to Exit
Exiting Program. No Session found on Cmd Line or in Registry.
Exiting Program. Unable to Connect to Primary Server.
Close current Session and Start new Session %s?
Close
Exiting Program. RDP File is missing or corrupt.
Exiting Program. No Server Found.
Exiting Program. Attempt to Apply Settings Failed.
